column15: Buy original Lapcare Optical Mouse L-70 - LOMOOP3177 at best price in India. Read its features  reviews and specifications. Get fast & assured delivery all over India.
column17:
The Lapcare USB Optical Mouse L-70 delivers smooth and accurate cursor control. It is also designed to provide good comfort during use and especially with thumb cushion. The wire is lengthy enough to give you good control.

Features:

  • Easy to Setup
  • Simply Plug & Play
  • Smooth and accuracy cursor control
